messages.body:
> From The Desk Of 


> Abel Taylor (Mr).  


> email:abeltaylor@elvis.com.  


> SOLICITING YOUR HONEST PARTNERSHIP IN BUSINESS.   


Apologies for communicating via this medium a business of this magnitude, as well as
the incidental approach of this proposal.This is due to the state of disarray presently in the family. My name is ABEL TAYLOR (MR),eldest son of the renowned and exiled PRESIDENT CHARLES TAYLOR of Liberia in western africa. I contact you in respect of my consignment, to take up the position of my ex-trustee/consignee in the 
collection of my deposits. This is as result of the cruel and insincere character portrayed by him (trustee) in the commisioning of earlier consignments. 
My father before his exile deposited a big steel box containing USD45,000,000(FORTY-FIVE MILLION UNITED STATES DOLLARS) moved via diplomatic means and deposited as a familytreasure in the vault of an european security company for safe-keeping.  


I seek your honest and confidential co-operation to the benefit of all parties,as i guarantee you 100% risk free on your path provided you are ready to maintain utmost secrecy.
Although this whole arrangement seems apparrent I still withold vital
information for the security of these consignments.  

On acknowledgement and full conviction of your willingness to comply all the required documents and priviledges will be issue to you thereby appointing you as the BEARER to this consignment, as I have decided to stop dealing in this business with my family name ''TAYLOR'hence your utmost importance in this transaction.  

On this effect,I have the instructions of my father to give 20% of the sum to you for a job well done and an additional 5% as compensation on taxation and other miscellaneous expenses.  

All I require of you is your honest co-operation to ensure investment of my percentagein your country which will be discussed later on.  

On receipt of your response, we shall discuss the proceedures as regards this arrangement.
  
Contact me via this secured and confidential  

mail:abeltaylor@elvis.com.  

Best Regards,  

Abel Taylor (MR).
messages.raw:
ABEL TAYLOR

Apologies for communicating via this medium a business of this magnitude, as well as the incidental approach of this proposal.This is due to the state of disarray presently in the family. My name is ABEL TAYLOR (MR),eldest son of the renowned and exiled PRESIDENT CHARLES TAYLOR of Liberia in western africa. I contact you in respect of my consignment, to take up the position of my ex-trustee/consignee in the
collection of my deposits. This is as result of the cruel and insincere character portrayed by him (trustee) in the commisioning of earlier consignments.
My father before his exile deposited a big steel box containing USD45,000,000(FORTY-FIVE MILLION UNITED STATES DOLLARS) moved via diplomatic means and deposited as a familytreasure in the vault of an european security company for safe-keeping.

[Scam-o-note: for pictures of Big Steel Boxes, see SHOW ME THE MONEY]

I seek your honest and confidential co-operation to the benefit of all parties,as i guarantee you 100% risk free on your path provided you are ready to maintain utmost secrecy. Although this whole arrangement seems apparrent I still withold vital information for the security of these consignments.

On acknowledgement and full conviction of your willingness to comply all the required documents and priviledges will be issue to you thereby appointing you as the BEARER to this consignment, as I have decided to stop dealing in this business with my family name ''TAYLOR'hence your utmost importance in this transaction.

On this effect,I have the instructions of my father to give 20% of the sum to you for a job well done and an additional 5% as compensation on taxation and other miscellaneous expenses.

All I require of you is your honest co-operation to ensure investment of my percentagein your country which will be discussed later on.

On receipt of your response, we shall discuss the proceedures as regards this arrangement.

Contact me via this secured and confidential

mail:abeltaylor@elvis.com.

Best Regards,

Abel Taylor (MR).

messages.subject: IN APPRECIATION.
messages.body:
Dear Friend,
 Thanks for our response,
 I understand your fear in this business.It seems quite
 impossible at times when people express their
 predicment,but you have all this information in the
 news spread by the media.Presently,my entire family is
 seeking asylum in Nigeria and this is the reason why I
 have contacted you because I can no longer experience
 safe travelling to meet the security companyin europe
 to collect the fund and this is why I have contacted
 you so that on due agreement with you,I will give you
 the necessary information that you will go along with
 to the security company inorder for the funds to be
 released to you.
 In the attachment is my picture and also that of my
 father who is the rightful owner of the deposit.
 Please be aware that you are free to request for the
 fulll evidencies but I will like to inform you that we
 will like to have some of your personal information to
 feel safe in this business dealing.
 On receipt of your response,I will be sending you
 attachments of the documents involved in the
 proceedures of this project.
 Bear in mind that the amount in question is USD45M,thus
 the confidentiality involved in this project cannot be
 over emphasised.

 Best Regards,

 Abel for the Family.
messages.raw:
ABEL TAYLOR

Subject: IN APPRECIATION.
Date: Sun, 16 May 2004 12:35:05 -0700 (PDT)

Dear Friend,
Thanks for our response,
I understand your fear in this business.It seems quite impossible at times when people express their predicment,but you have all this information in the news spread by the media.Presently,my entire family is seeking asylum in Nigeria and this is the reason why I have contacted you because I can no longer experience safe travelling to meet the security companyin europe to collect the fund and this is why I have contacted you so that on due agreement with you,I will give you the necessary information that you will go along with to the security company inorder for the funds to be released to you.
In the attachment is my picture and also that of my father who is the rightful owner of the deposit.
Please be aware that you are free to request for the fulll evidencies but I will like to inform you that we will like to have some of your personal information to feel safe in this business dealing.
On receipt of your response,I will be sending you attachments of the documents involved in the proceedures of this project.
Bear in mind that the amount in question is USD45M,thus the confidentiality involved in this project cannot be over emphasised.

Best Regards,

Abel for the Family.

messages.body:
Dear Lonslo Tossov,
sorry for my late response,I am currently running a
tight shedule trying to get a ph.D in a Nigerian
University.
As regards your email,I appreciate your effort in
trying to finish up all the dealing of this concern in
a short while.
I will send you all the documents of this business for
your view and assurance.But before i do this,i will
like to have a full personal information about you
because this documents are very precious and
confidential in nature.
Please send a picture of yourself,your full mailing
address and phone number.This will fully assure me of
your interest in this transaction.

I await your response.

Regards,

Abel for the Taylors.

ABEL TAYLOR

sorry for my late response,I am currently running a tight shedule trying to get a ph.D in a Nigerian University.
As regards your email,I appreciate your effort in trying to finish up all the dealing of this concern in a short while.
I will send you all the documents of this business for your view and assurance.But before i do this,i will like to have a full personal information about you because this documents are very precious and confidential in nature.
Please send a picture of yourself,your full mailing address and phone number.This will fully assure me of your interest in this transaction.

I await your response.

Regards,

Abel for the Taylors.

messages.subject: CONDITIONS OF BUSINESS
messages.body:
Dear Friend,
I appreciate your good works and suggestions in
finishing up this business.I will like you to view
through all this insturctions that will be a very good
guide to our business.They are my fathers instructions
on the guide of the business.

I MUST START BY THANKING YOU FOR YOUR WILLINGNESS TO
ASSIST US TO CONCLUDE THIS PROJECT OF MY FATHER, WHICH
MY FATHER WAS PLEASED WITH WHEN I GAVE HIM YOUR
INFORMATION AS TO BE THE TRUSTEE TO HIS DEPOSIT IN THE
U.K.

FOR US TO COMMENCE ON THIS PROJECT, HERE ARE WHAT WE
HAVE TO DO:

1: I HAVE SUBMITTED YOUR FULL INFORMATION TO THE
REPRESENTATIVE OFFICE OF THE SECURITY COMPANY FOR
APPROVAL AND AS SOON AS THEY GIVE US APPROVAL WITH
CONTACT OF THE OFFICER IN CHARGE WE WILL HAVE TO
PROCEED.

2:A PERCENTAGE ALLOWANCE OF 20% IS ISSUED TO YOUR
HUMBLE SELF AS A COMPENSATION FOR A JOB WELL DONE.THIS
IS NEGOTIABLE IF YOU ARE ABLE TO EXECUTE THIS
DILIGENTLY AND URGENTLY IN CASE OF SUBSEQUENT PROJECTS
WHICH WILL BE ALLOTED TO YOU BASED ON YOUR
RELIABILITY.ALSO NOTE THAT THE ADDITIONAL 5% GIVEN TO
YOU IS AS A COMPENSATION FOR THE TAXATION AND OTHER
EXPENSES IN CLEARING THE CONSIGNMENT.
3: YOU ARE TO MEET THE COMPANY IN THE U.K  FEW DAYS
BEFORE THE OFFICIAL TAKE OFF OF THE CONSIGNMENT TO BOOK
AN APPOINTMENT WITH THE OFFICER IN  CHARGE OF THIS
DEPOSIT  TO VIEW THIS CONSIGNMENT AND SIGNING OFF,OF
THE DEPOSITS BY THE COMPANY OFFICIALS TO YOUR
ALLOCATION.

4: I WANT YOU TO GUARANTEE ME THAT AS SOON AS YOU
COLLECT THIS DEPOSIT THAT YOU WILL NOT ABSCOND WITH
THIS FORTUNE. AS MY FATHER WORKED HIS WHOLE LIFE FOR
THIS.

5: YOU MUST ALSO UNDERSTAND THE IMPORTANCE OF THE
CONFIDENTIALITY OF THIS PROJECT AS MY FATHER HAS HIS
NAME AND IMAGE TO PROTECT. THIS IS 100 PERCENT RISK
FREE, BEAR IN MIND THAT WE ARE NOT WORKING AGAINST ANY
INTERNATIONAL LAW.

WITH ALL THESE YOU MUST HAVE UNDERSTOOD WHAT THIS
PROJECT IS ALL ABOUT NOW.
BEAR IN MIND THAT THE DOCUMENTS AND PARTICULARS OF THIS
CONSIGNMENT WILL BE CHANGED TO YOUR NAME IF YOU FOUND
TRUST WORTHY TO AID EASY COLLECTION AND FULL LEGAL BACK
UP IN THIS BUSINESS.
ON YOUR FULL AGREEMENT,MY LAWYER WILL PREPARE THE
AGREEMENT LETTER TO BE FAXED TO YOU FOR YOUR SIGNATURE
IN FULL CO-OPERATION.

AWAIT YOUR PROMPT RESPONSE.

SIGNED BY,

HIS EXCELLENCY,

SIR CHARLES TAYLOR.

messages.body:
Dear Friend,

Thanks for your mail.
Prior to the proceedings regarding the completion of
this project.I have spoken with the attorney and in few
days he must have processed our agreeement papers to in
respect of your involvement in this transaction,after
which we will have to proceed further to procure the
fund releasing documents which will be sent to the
security company where the funds are presently lodged
so that you can go ahead to make claims in that regards.
Furthermore, you are to call me on my direct mobile
line: +234-8056369325 as all further correspondence to
our communication regarding this project will be done
via my telephone number.

Thanks await your call.

Best of the day,

Mr.Taylor.

by my atttorney earlier today.

Thanks for bearing with me.

Mr.Taylor.

messages.subject: Dear Friend
messages.body:
Dear Friend,
Compliments of the day to you.
I am surprised that you have not written to me after
this long while of my very ill health.I have contacted
my father inorder to get his approval to release those
crucial documents you asked me to send but we are still
considering some factors so that we will not run into
the wrong hand because this is our family's whole life
treasure.
I was not able to call you or contact you due to the
fact that that I was suffering from diabetes and was
admitted to the hospital for sometime but I thank God I
am in well now and my wife is pregnant for a baby.
If you will like to know the security company holding
the box,this is their website.
http://sccholding.com/
Please get back to me as soon as possible.

Best Regards,

Mr.Abel Taylor.
messages.raw:
ABEL TAYLOR

Subject: Dear Friend
Date: Thu, 24 Jun 2004 01:38:54 -0700 (PDT)

Dear Friend,
Compliments of the day to you.
I am surprised that you have not written to me after this long while of my very ill health.I have contacted my father inorder to get his approval to release those crucial documents you asked me to send but we are still considering some factors so that we will not run into the wrong hand because this is our family's whole life treasure.
I was not able to call you or contact you due to the fact that that I was suffering from diabetes and was admitted to the hospital for sometime but I thank God I am in well now and my wife is pregnant for a baby. If you will like to know the security company holding the box,this is their website.
http://sccholding.com/
Please get back to me as soon as possible.
Best Regards,

Mr.Abel Taylor.
